message: Even in the rain, the city is full of life. The people I see actually seem to be enjoying the weather.
I feel out of place, so I keep to the edges of the street as I walk.
Although the rain has let up considerably, the sensation of the drops hitting my hair is still kind of uncomfortable.
I just don't have the energy to do anything about it.
I walk on aimlessly for a while, my mind blank. Before I know it, my feet have carried me back to the club.
I don't feel like going inside, so I lean against the wall of the alley.
The wall is freezing against my rain-soaked skin.
Outside like this, I could almost believe that I dreamt what happened.
But it wasn't a dream. The pain in my arm is proof of that.
...Will he ever come back?
Maybe not.
Even if he does, can we beat Toue like this?
A splash interrupts my thoughts.

name: 竜峰
message: "You're soaked."
The kimono-clad man is standing there.
He smiles and offers me his umbrella.

name: 竜峰
message: "What are you doing out here in the rain? You like being wet or something?"

name: 竜峰
message: "Grumpy, eh?"
He smirks and cocks his head to the side.

name: 竜峰
message: "Something the matter?"
He was right. That's exactly what happened.
As I stand there in silence, the man sighs.

name: 竜峰
message: "I'll take your silence to mean you're in no mood to talk. I imagine that's why you're hanging around here."

name: 竜峰
message: "But you'll catch a cold like that. You should hurry home."
He looks up to the sky to check the weather before returning his gaze to me.

name: 竜峰
message: "Not gonna?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I don't feel like going home."

name: 竜峰
message: "Uh-oh."
He narrows his eyes suggestively and smiles.

name: 竜峰
message: "That'd be one hell of a pickup line, if you were a girl. Now, I can't just leave you out here like this. Why don't we get you something hot to drink?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "But―"

name: 竜峰
message: "It's no trouble. C'mon."
He points at the building with his chin.

name: 竜峰
message: "The owner's a friend of mine. He lets me rent the upstairs room."

name: 竜峰
message: "You see, I don't actually live here in Platinum Jail."
The man finishes with a shrug.
He's... inviting me back to his room?
...I don't know what to do. Should I go with him?
I don't even know his name.
Why would he offer to help me in the first place? He barely knows me.
It's shady as hell.
...But at the same time, a lightbulb flashes in the back of my mind.
Koujaku told me to stay away from this place. And he got touchy when I mentioned this guy, too.
What if...
What if this guy knows something about Koujaku?

And then there's the warning he gave me before. It might have been a coincidence, but he practically foretold the future.

Maybe it's worth a shot.

name: 竜峰
message: "So, what do you say?"
...I nod.

name: 竜峰
message: "Great!"
The man smiles cheerfully and puts his arm around my shoulder.

name: 竜峰
message: "Can't have you getting even wetter, now. Oh, that reminds me. What's your name?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Aoba."

name: 竜峰
message: "Aoba. Nice name. I'm Ryuuhou."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ryuuhou..."

name: 竜峰
message: "Nice to meet you, Aoba."
Ryuuhou leads me toward the building. His smile never falters.
...Am I really doing the right thing?
The sound of rain against his umbrella is deafening.
